name: Sea War (Retrovision)
description:
Sea War is a Yamato clone like game where you are the
battleship at the bottom of the screen. The object of the
game is to shoot down as many enemy submarines, ships and
planes as you can without losing all your battleships.
The game is very simple and easy to play.
Arrow Keys = Move Left or Right
X Key = Shoot torpedos
Escape Key = End the game
Spacebar = Reset the game
